Glory [i](Whenever this attacks, you get {V}, a glory counter, then you may activate this card’s glory ability.)[/i]
{V}{V}| If Aspiring Evocatus isn’t equipped, create a Gladius Arms token attached to it. [i](It’s an Equipment with “Equipped creature gets +2/-1” and equip {3}. Attaching an Arms to a creature unattaches any others.)[/i]
